name: Poorzzle - Puzzle Alive
description:
Welcome to Poorzzle, a pure speculative puzzle game. Here, simple lines outline the ultimate purity, and 12 crafted puzzles will subvert your way of thinking.

Here, you will become a savior, unlocking the seal of the Prophet's fragment, in order to obtain the key to immortality. In-depth analysis of the logic and secrets behind the puzzle. Try, make mistakes, try again, every challenge and failure is the only way to the truth. However, reality seems to be hinting to you: this is a scam...

In the process, you will discover your special abilities: prediction, insight, imagination and good luck. These abilities will help you and make you more comfortable on the road to solving puzzles.

Poorzzle has no bloody battles, no lengthy walks. There is only a pure dialogue between you and the puzzle, a battle of challenge and wisdom. The difficulty is moderate and there is no need to worry about getting stuck. It allows you to enjoy the fun of solving puzzles while constantly challenging your own thinking.

Finally, may this key to immortality always be by your side, making every challenge the most beautiful memory in your life. Let us embark on this immortal journey full of wisdom and fun!
